| Overview                = The Iron Damsels were a group exclusively composed of female bounty hunters from various origins.{{r|Savage Sword of Conan #154|; Return of the Iron Damsels}}

Active during the [[Hyborian Age]], they crossed paths a least a few times with [[Conan (Earth-616)|Conan]] of [[Cimmeria]], but also with [[Red Sonja (Earth-616)|Red Sonja]] of [[Hyrkania]] and [[Valeria (Hyboria) (Earth-616)|Valeria]] of the [[Red Brotherhood (Earth-616)|Red Brotherhood]].{{r|Savage Sword of Conan #179|; Fury of the Iron Damsels}}
